Apache isn't responsible for uploading your file.  It's your script or module.    
In this case, apparently called "/webexp/index.php".

(In reply to comment #2)
> Apache isn't responsible for uploading your file.  It's your script or module.    
> In this case, apparently called "/webexp/index.php".

Moreover, when i try to "create a New Attachment" at this Bugzilla's site
the upload fails with the same error... that's really strange.
You may try it yourself, too.

kind regards.
